game.title: The Lost Temple of the Ancients
game.objective: Explore the long-abandoned temple and retrieve the ancient artifact.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden temple deep in the jungle, containing an ancient relic with immense power. Brave adventurers are needed to explore the treacherous ruins and bring back the treasure.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and a magical amulet

tasks.objective: Gather information about the temple's location
tasks.description: Speak to locals and gather rumors about the temple's whereabouts.

tasks.objective: Clear the temple entrance of traps and debris
tasks.description: Use your skills to disable deadly traps and clear a path into the temple.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the inner sanctum
tasks.description: Navigate treacherous puzzles and defeat powerful guardians to claim the relic.
